00015 
00016 class TFile;
00017 class TH1;
00018 class TH2;
00019 
00020 class JetCaloVariables {
00021   public:
00022   JetCaloVariables(const std::string& m_JetContainerName);
00023   ~JetCaloVariables(); 
00024 
00025 
00026   /* Rcone is calculated by using all cells with positive energy inside jet */
00027   static double  compute_RCone(const Jet* jet);
00028 
00029   /* energy fraction of the energetic cells inside jet. Only 2 energetic cells in 
00030    * had. calorimeter and 32 energetic cells in em calorimeeter are used here. */
00031   static double  compute_RatioLeadingCells(const Jet* jet);
00032 
00033   /* compute LLR obtained with jet EM fraction*/
00034   double  compute_LLREmFraction(const Jet* jet);
00035 
00036   /* compute LLR obtained with Jet Rcone and Ratio_{LeadingCells}
00037    * NOTE: we did 2-dim pdf for Rcone and Ratio_{LeadingCells} because of
00038    * the strong correlation between them. */
00039   double  compute_LLRRconeANDRatio(const Jet* jet);
00040   
00041   static double  compute_jetTime(const Jet* jet);
00042 
00043   /* 1-dim pdf obtained with jet EM fraction. 2-dim pdf obtained with jet Rcone and Ratio_{LeadingCells}.
00044    * Such pdfs are done in different bins of jet pt: 20-40GeV, 40-80GeV, 80-160GeV and >160GeV.
00045    * NOTE: Only pdfs for Cone4H1TopoJets and AntiKt4H1TopoJets are provided. */
00046   StatusCode getpdf();
00047               
00048  private:
00049 
00050   std::vector<TH1*> cosmicPdf_EMFraction;
00051   std::vector<TH1*> dijetPdf_EMFraction;
00052   std::vector<TH2*> cosmicPdf_RconeANDRatio;
00053   std::vector<TH2*> dijetPdf_RconeANDRatio;
00054   std::vector<double> ptbin_pdf;
00055   TFile *filePDF;  
00056   std::string JetContainerName;
00057 
00058 };
00059 #endif
